caption: The video tells the story of two astronauts on the space station who wake up from hibernation and decide to fight the artificial intelligence on the space station. Artificial intelligence operates the various equipment of the space station in space and confronts the astronauts in space. One astronaut pushed him away to protect another and died. Another astronaut successfully entered a locked chamber from space and confronted an AI head-on. On the other hand, some of the engines that have been shut down on the Earth's surface are gradually starting up again. Brother and sister are in the team is recharging supplies.
